reference.title: Creating Server Groups
reference.shortdesc: Server groups are created with the POST /pools/default/serverGroups HTTP method and URI.

section.title: HTTP method and URI
section.p: POST /pools/default/serverGroups creates a server group with a specific name. In the following example, Group A is created. If the group name has a space, for example, Group A, use double quotes; for example, "Group A".
